author: Alex Puncekar
description:
We got a chance to speak with Steve Hugh Westenra about their upcoming sword & sorcery novella The Barbarian at Dream’s End. Westenra is the writer of the epic fantasy novel The Wings of Astaroth and the horror comedy novel The Erstwhile Tyler Kyle. We talk about the sword & sorcery genre, He-Man, and the […]

The post INTERVIEW: with author Steve Hugh Westenra appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: INTERVIEW: with author Steve Hugh Westenra

author: Adrian Collins
description:
The conclusion to Jeremy Szal’s space opera The Common has a release date, and after the un-put-downable Stormblood and the expansive Blindspace it’s time to wrap up this story with Wolfskin. I’ve been excited to pick this book up for a while, and am currently a bit over halfway through and thoroughly enjoying the read. However, you, […]

title: EXCLUSIVE EXCERPT: from Wolfskin by Jeremy Szal
